content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #63713 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?

@pnkfelix revived this issue assigning I-prioritize. I assume it's more to check the progress and push it forward? Not sure it's a bug/regression either

more context in this Zulip topic
https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/241847-t-compiler.2Fwg-incr-comp/topic/Removing.20HashStable.20from.20hash.20maps.20and.20btree.20maps

(mention to Felix for additional context, if needed)
yes, my intent was to flag this as an excellent task to help prevent future issues. the recent comment from @mw outlines why.
